name: BibliothecaIndex
0:
”Alexa, ask Bible Index where Proverbs chapter three is.”
”Alexa, ask Bible Index where Proverbs seven is.”
”Alexa, ask Bible Index to locate Proverbs five.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible index
des: Ever wanted to pick up your copy of Bibliotheca and read a specific passage out of Psalms or Proverbs? Without chapters and verses on the page, this can be incredibly daunting. This skill aims to make that process quick and easy.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
